name: funcitup
description: Example app for Azure Functions with TypeScript and custom decorators

scripts.prebuild:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm typebox-generator -r src
scripts.prebuild: pnpm run clean && pnpm typebox-generator -r src
scripts.predeploy: pnpm run build:prod && node -e 'var p=require("./package.json");p.scripts=p.dependencies=p.devDependencies=void 0;p.main="src/functions/index.js";console.log(JSON.stringify(p,null,2))' > dist/package.json && cp host.json local.settings.json dist
scripts.deploy: pushd dist; func azure functionapp publish devFunc001; popd
scripts.prestart: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
